name: Netflix Clone
description: A clone of a very popular streaming platform made using Next.js and the TMDb API. For now, I have implemented the basic UI with media details fetch features.

name: COGIP
description: This is an invoice management solution designed to streamline invoice creation, management, and tracking processes. The application consists of a backend API and database, developed by the backend team, and a frontend React app created by the frontend team. The app features CRUD operations, responsive UI, subtle animations made using GSAP as well as data fetching from the API.

name: Weather app
description: A simple weather app built in Vanilla Javacript and designed using SCSS. For this app I used the free OpenWeather API. The app display dynamic color gradient based on the current weather, display weather previsions for 5 days and save your latest input in the local storage.

name: Studio 44
description: A static landing page made for a fictionnal music studio. On this project I implemented a GSAP preloader as well as reveal animations when you load the page.
